text: wishwakoshaya kiyawima saha yathranaya kirima sadaha udaw
saththakim me karmanthaya aaraksha kirima yanu sirilaka de siripapa dena lankadipayema diyunu kala haki panayaki.
hari dan thama thaman thama thamanwa ewaluwet kara karannala thaman ayithi wenne koyi kandetada kiyala
kawi sitha nam niyamayi.
rajayathanaya yanu aayathana 6 n ( asa kana naya diwa shariraya saha mana) nidahas wi maha pragnyawa dakimayi.
aneka pramithiya ha deshanawala pawathina thaththwaya usas nathi bawata mathayak thibe.
dan masayak randawa thaba gatha haki paridi rudawum niyogayakata yatath kara atha.
man thuma boho awasthawala dakala thiyenawa ape kastiya kamarawa andum damana almariye dala thiyenawa, ehema nathnam poth dana kabad ekaka dala yathuru dala thiyenawa.
karu, sajith, dayasiri dinawiya yuthu yayi pata pradarshanaya wiya.
wirayin upadinne jayagrahanayen nowa aramuna mathaya.
kalifoniyawe patrishiya sturla laga thiyena pa්rasiddha rupalawanya shilpaya mosthara nirupanaya wagema ranganaya gana hadarimak kala.
tharagaya nima kirimata indiya kandayamata lakunu kihipayak awashyawa sitiyadi kriyathmaka wu owun krida pitiya thulata plastik wathura bothal wisi kirimata aarambha kala.
dinakata muhunu potha bhawitha karana shri lankikayan sankhyawa wayasa awurudu 18th 65ta wadi pirisa atharin 50000k pamana wana bawa ganan bala atha.
wegayen ihala pahala yana husma matama asena tharam musala nihadiyawak ehi wiya...
jathyanthara wimarshana yantha්ranayak awashya bawa, eksath jathinge manawa himikam maha komasariswariya kiya atha.
kolapata salwar ekak andala hitiya aa samanyayen priyamanapa penumak thiyana wayasa wisi dekak wage tharuniyak.
namuth aya nawatha miyanmarayata hakiyawa labana pudgayan pilibandawa hadinwimak nokala athara adala thahawurukirime kriya piliwela sidu wana aakaraya pahadili kirimak da nokarana ladi.
dawasak othelo me leftinanwarayage kamareta enakota me lensuwa dakinawa.
ee amathima mangin minis wignyanaya wenas kirimata haki ya.
obe adahasa ahuwe eekayi.
maranayata pera thaththata wadha dunna dayi mama nodanimi.
mata hithaganna baha, ayi ehema wune kiyala.
ee nisa ee gana katha kota wadak nathi nisa eeta koheth ma sambandha nathi wenath siddhiyak desa balamu.
molita watina beheth labana.
ema lakshanaya pamanakma owun wirayan lesa salakimata pramanawathya.
yanthrika sewikawan wisin sarasanu labu “para”, sulu mohothakin manthrana sabhawa idiriye peni sitiya ya.
kese wethath aaktik kalapaye sampath ukahaganimata erehi wa da mathayak athi bawa amathaka kala yuthu no we.
namuth pasugiya masaye ella wu wisha awi praharayata thama hamudawa wagakiwa yuthu bawata ella wana chodana janadhipathi asad prathikshepa kaleya.
mema sampurna sammukha sakachchawa pahathin kiyawiya hakiya.
chithra kalawa gana nodathath, lakunuk nodi yanne kohomada!
ra: eya dipu ganan mama oyalath ekka kiyana eka hari nane ma: na eya kiwwe apita oyata denna thiyena okkoma gana dila iwarayi kiyala ra:mona pissuda ane poth hathatama mata dunne ringit 1000yi....
danata da himikam liyapadinchi kirime kriyawaliya thula wasarakata ek warak pamanak liyapadinchiya sidu we.
sakakaru ada adhikaranayata idiripath kirimata niyamithawa athayi sandahan we.

warshawa athi wi thibena wakawanuwaka gowithanata jalashawalin jalaya nikuth nokirima ,rajaya porondu wu paridi adumudalata pohora miladi ganimata nomathi wima, saha gowinta waga wandi mudal nomathi wima aadi karunu pilibandawa sakachcha kirima sandaha mema madhya hamuwa kandawa thibini.
ganath liyanna hithuna.
pradeshiya sabhawe lekam wariyage prakashaya kularathnamawathe sewapiyasata ibiagul damimatahethuwak unada ?
raha adu nathi nisa thawath thalu marannemu.
wampasa kamaraya raju thamange prayojanaya sandaha wenkara gathi.
nathiwi yana boho de gana api liwwemu, kiyawu wemu.
methana inna boho demawpiyan rassawal karana ayayi.
janamadhyata uththara denna sarath fonseka samanga sanwadayakata enna kiya eda sitama api gotabhayata kiwwa.
eekane me awuruddak withara oyata balamehe karalath oya thama namenne naththe..
(mahindata airehiwa tharaga kirime ‘pa්rajathantha්rawadi-waradata’ sarath fonsekata da yuliyata athwu iranama athwu bawa apa danimu.
""ane mame, mage karaththayata roda dekak naha.
esema ewani ee mel sadaha pilithuru yawimen ha eewa anek ayata yawimen walakinna"
rajayata ayawayak sammatha karaganna nam parlimenthuwa wisuruwa harala bahuthara balayak sahitha aanduwak pihituwa gatha yuthuyi.
buts sapaththu 6.
apita ee abhiyoga jayaganna deshapalana pakshabheda, jathibheda yatapath karamin siyalu janathawa ekata athwal bandagatha yuthuyi.
owunge jiwitharakshawa thaka mama nam sandahan kirimen walaki sitinawa.
kumana aakarayakata ho athithaye ho anagathaye yam deyak siduwiya haki bawa warthamana mohothaka sita yameku prakasha karannenam eya anawakiyak lesa handinwiya haka.
ee owun ' mama washayen kenek atha ' yana sankalpayata ali gali wasaya karamin jiwithaya prithimathya yana mithyawata basa athi heyini.
eeka waradi nan niwaradi de dana ganna eka neda watinne..

2011/2012 adhyayana warshaya sandaha wadipura sisun 5609 denaku wishwawidyawalata athulath kara ganime prayogika gatalu mathu wi athi bawin eya nirakaranaya kara ganima sandaha wana yojana 2k wishwawidyala prathipadana komisama wisin mosamak mangin shreshtadhikaranayata idiripath karana ladi.shreshtadhikaranaya mita pera niyama kala paridi atham patamala sandaha sisun thora ganimata pawath wu abhiyogatha ho prayogika parikshanayen sisun asamath wima nisa mema gatalukari thaththwaya athi wi thibena bawa wishwawidyala komisama penwa di thibe.atham disthrikkawala sitina eka ma sisuwaku ho atham wishayayan sandaha awashya samath lakunu labagena nathayi ema mosamehi sandahan we.
eya mage durwalakamak wiya haki ya.
eekatath lankawata wage noyekuth anwartha nam thibuna.
ratha wahana nawatha athi niwasa asala bod lali kihipayak atha.
lankawa nathikota , nikan balanna hithenneth na appa
sagarika nishanthi kumari danata imbaulana shri sena widyalaye natyachariniya we.
mama jiwithe winnda....

janapathiwarayata me sadaha madihath wiyayuthu bawatath 17 wanadata pera dinayak, welawak labadi me pilibadawa rajaye waidya niladharinge sangamaya samaga sakachchawakata paminena lesa illa siti bawa eema wruththiya samithi yomu kala lipiya magin wadiduratath wadidura adahas dakwu ema sangamaye samajikayin sadahan kalaha.
pasal sisunta 2013 wasara sandaha nomilaye pela poth labadime jathika uthsawaya mahanuwara dharmaraja widyalayiya shrawanagarayedi eeye (6 da) pawathi awasthawedi ee mahatha me bawa kiweya.
samaja sambandhatha walin aath wima manasika pidakari thaththwayan waladi sulaba thaththwayaki.
ikmanata eelanga kotasath danna....
awidhimath thorathuru sahitha widesha gaman balapatha්rayak laba thaba gaththe yayi parlimenthu mantha්ri wimal wirawansha mahathage birida wana shashi wirawansha mahathmiyata
meka pita ekek ho ee nangiyage pawle ayeku dakkoth bonna kesewethath kanna dansala nomilema labeyi.
samanya mathrukawak nam thamange kament eka anith ayage kament kiyawala dammath kamak na.
wari paddhathi nawikaranaya wuna.
ajith ayiye mata hithenne iyan duppathun gana hinawuna noweyi.
wagakiwayuthu wyaparika aayathanayak lesa etisalat samajaya ha parisaraya kerehi dhanathmaka balapamak athi kirimata awashya wu sammathayen obbata yamata uthsaha karayi.

ee nisa api kiyanawa madhyata, mathiwaranayedi sama deshapalana wyaparayakatama sadharana ayithiyak, sadharana kalayak sadharana warthakaranayak madhya thula karayi kiyala api thula balaporoththuwak thibenawa.
ee madiwata kamare thiyena hadu ganda.

namuth kithunuwan wu mema kotasa itha awasanawantha wiya. 1544 di yapanayedi sankili namathi pradeshadhipathiya katholika aagama walandagath 600 k pirisa ghathanaya kala athara, panaberagath piris rata thula kalawalata wadi sangawunaha.
ee ohuge ayiya.
meya ada karthrun 32 kata aasanna pirisakage dayakathwayen nirmanaya wennaki.
enisa aarugambe chaithyaya wada nima karanna api bahira shilpinta bhara dunna.
nosthradam pawasanne ohu jiwath wu kalaye romanu palliyen berima sandaha ohu katath notherena bhashawakin mema anawaki siwpadawalin liyu bawayi.
mehi keman dupath aashrithawa nauka 340k pamana pawathina athara me athara guwan yana prawahanaya karana dawantha naukada me athara we.
janaprawadayata anuwa gal thalawakin wata wunu wishala pokunak sahitha me wiharaya saha kotte rajadhaniya umagakin sambandha karala thibila thiyenawa.
eya magen iwath karannata ayata tika welawak gathawina.
karawe janathawa demala ananyathawaya athahara sinhala bhashawa piliganima nisa rate bahuthara janathawa diyawimata samathwa siti.
yudha jayagrahanayen deshapalanaya kala aya amathaka kala wadak aanduwa karayi –…
apata issarahin athul wennata giya kollekwa polisiya aapahu harawa yawwe kota kalisam andagena athulata yannata bariya kiyaya.
kilinochchiyedi kala prakashaya demala jathika sandhanaya wisin itukara atha. .. (263)
ewita mema web adawiya ingrisi basin sanwada karana web adawiyak wanu atha.
paya 24 ma mage durakathanaya wiwruthawa thibunu bawa me sabhawe inna pakshe, wipakshaka sawoma dannawa.

(suddan jiwathwana ratawala yuddha nomathiwimada, awiaayudha welendan ema kalapayen obbata gos welandam kirimada mewanima katayuththaki) ee anuwa aasiyanu ha aprikanu kalapiya ratawala welanda danwim ha upakramika diriganwim thulin thama welandapola thahawuru karaganima sandaha owun hata haki wiya.
habayi ithin echcharama thamayi.
gamwala tharuniyan jins andinawa, dan aarthikaya hondayi!!
heta awasana kotasa
kontha nonata hondayi nam eekath mokada?
mage yaluwa kiwwa echcharawath eyawa wishwasa karanna bari nam issarahata mona mona eewa kiyayida..
sangithaye thibuna winaya, sanyamaya nawa parapure awashyatha samaga kohe gihin da kiyala hoya ganna naha..
pirisak pamina sitiya.
dennagema senehasa laba dunna.
kalayage awamen daruwan denna nisa mama karyayabahula weddi wije ee pitapath daruwan lawa katapadam karagaththa.
ekak bogambara bandhanagarayeya.
teli natya thihakata wadiyi.
shri lanka hamudawa thama lamayin mardanaya kirimata rasayanika awi bhawitha kala bawaya.
danuth eekama witharayi koranna puluwan kalakanni parata bahinna bayayi.
ema nisa api uman saha wasana lada kanu paddhathi gananawak idikirima aarambha kala mema wyapruthiyen, digukalina wenasak nagarayata ithama athyawashya nisa.
mm….math oya kathawa ahala thiyenawa…ape wadi hitiyo kathawatath kiyanne ooka
sinama karmanthayata loba bandagath tharunayaki.
oowa kiyawana ewunta ithin dewi pihitaya.
me nisa ema pirisage wimathiyata meya hethuwak wiya.
owunta wisil gasimata misa hari maga yana lesa udghoshanaya karanna bahuthara janathawak ho wipakshayak ahalakawath natha.
alu walallakin pruthiwiya wasena anawakiya !

warthamanaye dhiwara ha jalaja sampath sanwardhana amathyawaraya washayen katayuthu karana ohu gana ketiyen sandahan kalahoth thaman darana amathya dhurayen babalenne nathiwa ema amathya dhurayata wadi watinakamak laba demin amathya dhuraya babalawana amathyawarayeki.

sanda wata parayana punchi kakulu mala enu bomu jayapane anduru gabe kandu mudune payana sanda wanne anduru mage hada mudune handa payapanne nura rangum lol hadawath sasalayi aadara sitha nisalayi duk niwila sith niwila jiwitha pahan sale aadare . . .
wesak dawase mehema dewal ahanna dakinna wenne ape pawukarakamatada manda.desh
mewani bim sima sahitha nisath, wagawen wadi aswannak laba ganima sandahath, bim perala maha kannaye palamu warshawa samanga siyumwa pasa sakasa bija wapirima ho situwima wadagathya.
osap wimedi garbhashaye athulatha biththiye pataka galawi yama siduwe, osap rudhiraya lesa masakata warak yoni margayen pitawanne me pataka kotas saha ehi adangu rudhirayayi.
eeth wenas ahakin wenas widiyata lokaya dakinna gihin mata nathiunu de ananthayi
nyashtiya thulata ringa gath darshanaya ekineka mishra wi patali nul bolayak men liha gatha nohakiwa ee me atha paddena warna deha desata gaman kala.
janadhipathiwaraya saha rajitha senarathna amathyawaraya eya prathikshepa kara athinam ee gana owungen wimasiya yuthu bawath ohu pawasiya.
walikada ghathana pethsama salaka balima 17da _ dinamina
dan balanna wela thiyana de.
oonama rupalawanya nishpadanayak ganiddi ape rate dadi unusum deshagunayata galapenawada balanna.
sinhala awurudu pathum ha charithra warithra gana nam kiyanna thiyenne wimalarathna kumaragama kiyapu widiyata 'man nokeruwath nokarami eya garahima' kiyala thamayi.
eewa kriyathmaka karalimata athhada balime paryeshana bhumiya lesa thoraganne hambanthota disthrikkayayi.
anuwa katin kiwwa wage neweyi welawa balanakota 1 yi 20 yi.

thama awashyathawata yatathwa sitinne yayi nodanne nam minisata nidahaswiya nohakiya, manda yath nidahasa hamawitamath dina ganu labanne, thama awashyathawen nidahas wima sandaha wana, ohuge kawarawitekawath mulumaninma sarthaka nowana uthsahayan thula wana heyini.
naha naha meya nanna akamathi naha .
rasayanika pohora ha wenath krushi rasayana salakiya hakke nawina waidya widyawedi yoda ganna aushadhawalata samana kala haki deyak lesaya.
dannawane ada kale minissunge hati?
mul dina dekedi pihitawanu labu wartha 13 saha eeye (8 wanida) pihituwana lada nawa wartha 11th samagin me wanawita mue tharaga wartha 24 k pihitu wimata kridaka kridikawo samath wuha.
me prakashaya adu milata thel tika singa ganimata ahamad innija janapathi rawatimata damu amak dayi apa danne natha.
mese dewarakma mama oba sipa gena atha.
adhraiwayata ‘dhrawa ya’ yeyi5 .
mathalanta dan sanipada?
aththatama harima awiweki nisa, liyaganna apahasu nisa,hithe thibunata liyaganna bari nisa,mewayin prayojana noganna nisa,kuhaka kamnisa.
mama wijaya katuwa lestar mahathage niwasata giyemi.

maha bankuwe bandumkara magadiya pilibandawa danata rakshitha bandhanagaraye pasuwana arjun alosiyas mahatha thamanta rupiyal miliyanayaka chekpathak labadun bawa hitapu amathya dayasiri jayasekara mahatha piligani.
"mis ada hugak parakkuyi..
* kese wuwada dhanuwata senasuruge paminima badha thibunada dadi apala nodenu atha.
wada gedara aran yanne ahawal magulak karannada?
hondata wada danna eka prasiddhiye wena ekekge adupadu pennala denna yanne na.
namuth mama kawadawath sujatha akkage githa gayanayen janapriya wannata uthsaha kale na.ma gayana kale magema githayi.
ihatha udaharana deka wisin bahu manthri aasana pilibandawa ape adahasa nir-pakshika karayi.
namuth ithaliyan horuth innawa.
“wasthawika yatharthayak thiyanawa” kiya wishwasa kirima, “wasthawika yatharthayak natha” yanuwen wishwasa kirimata wada buddhimaya washayen “pahath” wenne kohomada kiyala mata pahadili na.
bauddhayan meya therumganne nam yeheki.
amerikankarayo dennekne athsan karala thiyenne” yannayi.
rajjuruewo samana pashnaya ka wisin sithana ladadayi wichara mehaushadha pandithayan wisin yayi asa sathutuwuha.

kisiyam katayuththak sandaha pruthiwiya matha jiwath wana minisun siyalu dena atharin ahambau lesa ek ayek pamanak ithiriwa anek siyalu dena maranayata path wana wyasanayakadi ese ithiri wana pudgalaya oba wannata athi sambhawithawa shukranuwak dimbayak samanga ekathu wimata athi idakada men 30 gunayak pamana we.
sarthaka wi ee ayata usas prathipala labaganimata hakiwuna.
me balanna mechchara godariyak antila ankalla awilla innawa mage bardde ekata, appachchi withalayi thama palakku....."
ee gamana mama eeka ath arala damma.dawasak mama aluthma malu aragena neluwa polata giya.
onna likhithawama thiyenawa.
dewiyanwahansegi kattiyata anuwa nam siyalu dena mawa aththe samanawa nisa manasada samanaya.
indiyawe katholika sabhawa menma kithunu sabhath sankranthi lingikayan gana awadhanaya yomu kota sanwada ha kriyamarga ganimin sitinawa.

koronawen pahara wadunu punchi thiraye arbudaya | silumina shri lankawata pamanak nowa mulu mahath lokayatama me wana wita kowid wasangathaya wyapthawa pawathinne siyalu ratawala samanya jiwithayada akriya karawamini.
eeta passe nam shakthimath nayakathwayak bihi wune naha.
ma mehi yojana kara aththe mahindata pin agamathi kamak dimata noweyi
awurudu 85 k wayasathi karate ugnawana guruwarayek gana kolonnawa pradeshayen wartha we.

ayawaya sambandhawa wiruddha pakshayath andamanda wela inne.danata thibena wathawaranaya thula mewani ayawayak idiripath kirima sambandhayen shri lanka nidahas pakshaye ape langa idala ehapaththata giya hitapu amathiwaru math ekka kathakarala meka honda ayawayak bawa kiwwa.podujana peramune samajikathwaya gath manthriwaru dedenek ma samaga parlimenthu pusthakalayedi kiwwa meka thibena wathawaranaya thula idiripath kala honda ayawayak, meka naraka naha kiyala.namuth parlimenthuwa athule saha eliyeee aya wiwechanaya karamin kathakaranawa.me widiyata samajaya athule bahutharayak dena ayawaya gana prasadayen kathakaranawa.
eekabaddha wipakshaye 'manthri watupa' buddhi ansha niladharinta |
eya rata pawadimakayi waradi lesa therum gathha.
ethakota me deshapalana wathawaranaya sampurnayenma wenas .
selo tep kali dekak wewlannathi ekek (mokada wewlana ayata tikak amaruyi meka) thawa makro pinthura ganna oone karana dewal..
erangikawa sithamathama salasum sahagathawa ghathanaya kaleda ese nathinam yathurupadiyen watimen miyagiyadayi adhikaranayen thiranaya kerenu atha.

mobitel wisin sapayanu labana ihala thakshanayen piripun pa්rayogika sanniwedana wisandum pa්raweshayan, pipals inshuwarans rakshana samagame anagatha dakma anuwa owun balaporoththu wana karyayan siyalla sarthakawa sampurna karaganima wenuwen sahaya dakwanu athi bawa apage wishwasayayi.
mata aya kerehi tharahak athi weyi.
aththatama sathun atharin buddhimathma minisa
rata thula deshapalana arbudayak mathuwa athi mohothaka muslim paksha manthriwarun wideshagathawima deshapalana karaliye kathabahata lakwa thibe.
ohu me bawa kiya sitiye mathaledi pawathi ema disthrikkaye shri lanka nidahas paksha sammelanaya amathamini.

amathithuma math ekka patalenna epa anarkali wage neweyi math ekka patalunoth awurudu wissakata hire yawanawa yayi dakunu palath sabha manthrini githa kumarasinha mahathmiya sulu apanayana boga sanwardhana niyojya amathya nishantha muthuhettigama mahathata kiwaya.

mahacharya sarath gunapala mahatha, “thayiwanaya, dakunu koriyawa wani ratawal keti kalayak thula manawa sampatha widyawa ha thakshanaya wenuwen aayojanaya kirima thulin sighra aarthika sanwardhanayak athkaragena thibenawa.
mehidi apata cheri waththata athulu wi awashya pamana cheri kada gatha hakiya.

sashrikathwaya aramunu kota gath sokari natakaya gamiyange samuhikathwaya men ma sahodarathwaya da owun sathuwa thibu rangana prathibhawa da manawin pilibimbau karayi.kanata gotha lu sapumal kakulu nela nelainata hawadi kamani rathna andithi rulara labandata hatte mudu athala datha salasa laruwata me numbaa lada saba mada sitithi kela kelakolam natakaye prabhawayashri lankeya janathawa sathu sampradayika kala urumayan athuren kolam jana natakayata himiwanuye adwithiya sthanayaki.
dipthi mage nirmana sambandhayen dakwu samahara de ma ohu penwa dena thek nodana siti dewal.

udghoshanaya atharathuradi sidukara athi paharadim mangin janadhipathi lekam karyalaya asala nawatha thibu gini niwana rathayakata athulu rajaye depalawalata hani siduwi athi athara ee anuwa polisiya mangin owunta erehiwa podu depala panatha yatathe nadu pawara atha.
miyusik tikak dala gaththa maru set ekak siraseda koheda giya.
eya gangata muhuna la pihiti elm, aldar ha wenath noyek gas pirunu akkarayaka pamana bhumi bhagayak wiya.
eeth eekath dalama baluwama thama danenne, eekath tikak withara anawashya pidanayak kiyala.
eda dewinuwara shri wibhuthiya pilibandawa deshatana warthawalin kiyawena thorathuruwalin ehi athi maha haskam pilibandawa apata karunu karana labagatha hakiya.
"anna anna ali enawa" nopenena manayakata atha dik karapu meka ka gahanawa.
ayi mehema une...

ebawin janadhipathiwaraya athata pathkirimata niyamitha rathupaswala pilibanda awasan warthawa mahajana niyojithayange awadhanayata lakwiya yuthu yayi da ehi pitapathak sabhagatha kala yuthu yayi da yojana karanawa.
polisiye as wasa jiwa unda 3000 k gallata geniyanna hadu sujige golayata wada waradiyi...!
nirmanashili dayasiri janadhipathithuma samanga ekwi wayambaata paminima wasanawak.
me okkomala kalpana karanne senanga gennayi.
eeta passe awurudde wikkarege balukaputu danaya dennata kenek nathi nisa api kipa denek ekathuwi balu kaputu danaya lasthi kara ballanta kaputanta dunnemu.
